properties.entry: select i.instance_id, j.judgement_id, i.train, d.disease_id, f.fold, f.run from cv_fold f inner join cv_fold_instance i on f.cv_fold_id = i.cv_fold_id inner join i2b2_2008_anno a on a.disease = f.label and a.docId = i.instance_id and a.source = 'intuitive' inner join i2b2_2008_disease d on d.disease = a.disease and d.disease_id = @export.label@ inner join i2b2_2008_judgement j on j.judgement = a.judgement left join hotspot_zero_vector hzv on hzv.instance_id = i.instance_id and hzv.corpus_name = 'i2b2.2008' and hzv.experiment = 'ontocuis' and hzv.label = a.disease and hzv.cutoff = @export.cutoff@ where hzv.hotspot_zero_vector_id is null
